segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one is doing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is already a mess, and it’s getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to ruin the floor if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m so frustrated watching this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip and fall if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a waste of water and a mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
